item.title: Try Cloud Website Load Testing Free
item.description:
You’ve established your online presence, but the question remains: how strong is it? Just like the story of the three little pigs, a website needs to be built with strong materials to withstand the elements. While a website might appear impressive when it’s not in use, the true test comes with a surge of visitors. Load testing is the only way to determine if your site can handle high traffic...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/try-cloud-website-load-testing-free/

item.title: Taming The Video Bandwidth Monster
item.description:
Cisco forecasts that video will represent over half of all internet traffic by the close of next year, reaching 62% by 2015’s end. This surge in video consumption, driven by streaming and downloads, necessitates that both providers and consumers adapt to the escalating demand for bandwidth. Netflix’s emergence as a cable and satellite TV competitor is accelerating the dominance of video data on the internet. Consumers are experiencing a transformation in how they consume “TV,” now utilizing computers, tablets, and smartphones...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/taming-the-video-bandwidth-monster/
